arts.ttl: “Time for change” | West Ham thrashed 5-0 in abysmal Liverpool display
arts.sum: West Ham’s embarrassing performance results in Liverpool thumping. That result has been coming for some time. Although the Hammers were unbeaten in 4 games, they hadn’t particularly looked deserving of any of the points they picked up, including wins over Wolves and Southampton. While the first 20 minutes wasn’t awful, Liverpool started the game stronger... The post “Time for change” | West Ham thrashed 5-0 in abysmal Liverpool display appeared first on The West Ham Way.

arts.ttl: Arne Slot weighs in on Trent Alexander-Arnold's future after Liverpool star appeared to drop a major hint about Real Madrid interest with his goal celebration in 5-0 win at West Ham
arts.sum: With just six months remaining on his Liverpool contract, speculation has been rife that the 26-year-old will opt to seek pastures new when his deal expires.

arts.ttl: Arne Slot provides an update on Joe Gomez after the defender suffered a hamstring injury in Liverpool's 5-0 win over West Ham
arts.sum: The first-half injury to the versatile defender, who has deputised brilliantly in the absence of Ibrahima Konate , was the only blemish on a perfect night for the Reds in London.

arts.ttl: Jamie Redknapp hails 'phenomenal' Mohamed Salah as the Liverpool star scores and provides two assists in 5-0 thrashing of West Ham
arts.sum: Salah continued his excellent campaign as he scored and provided two assists during his side's comprehensive victory at London Stadium.

arts.ttl: Mohamed Salah is an all-timer: Winners and Losers from Liverpool 5-0 West Ham
arts.sum: Mohamed Salah is an all-timer: Winners and Losers from Liverpool 5-0 West Ham Salah has scored and assisted in a single game 8 times already this season, which is an all-time record in the history of the Premier League.

arts.ttl: West Ham can do better after 'tough day' - Lopetegui
arts.sum: West Ham boss Julen Lopetegui says today was a "tough day" for his side and that they can "do better" following their 5-0 defeat by Liverpool.

arts.ttl: Mohamed Salah delivers update on Liverpool contract talks after West Ham win
arts.sum: Mohamed Salah scored and laid on two assists against West Ham before he was asked about his uncertain Liverpool future.

arts.ttl: West Ham United vs. Liverpool: Trent Alexander-Arnold contract latest as defender scores in Premier League win
arts.sum: Liverpool right-back Trent Alexander-Arnold responds to rumours that he is set to join Real Madrid in the summer when his contract expires.

arts.ttl: Salah stars as Liverpool rout West Ham to move leaders eight points clear
arts.athr: Barney Ronay at the London Stadium
arts.sum: With 54 minutes gone at London Stadium, Trent Alexander-Arnold took a pass from Ryan Gravenberch with time to wait and look up, the lack of pressure from the West Ham players almost a public snub, before spanking a deflected shot past Alphonse Areola to make it 4-0 to Liverpool and kill off once again a game that was already long since dead. In the process Alexander-Arnold did at least provide a moment of cartoon drama, performing a slightly embarrassed silencing-the-chatter celebration, one hand raised to his ear. Perhaps this was a reference to stories overnight about a move to Real Madrid, something parts of the Spanish media have suggested is all but formalised. Continue reading...

arts.ttl: Mo Salah gives update on his contract situation at Liverpool after starring in the Reds' 5-0 thrashing of West Ham
arts.sum: Mo Salah has provided an update on his contract situation at Liverpool, as he nears the end of his deal.
